availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Edwards (Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer judge)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, druggist and judge. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy E. Edwards. Father of William W. Edwards, Mary Y. Edwards, William H. H. Edwards, Alice Edwards, James Edwards, and Ann E. Edwards. Druggist in Mercer County in 1860. Presiding judge of the Mercer County Court in Mercer County from c1863 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population/Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, District 2, p. unknown.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Salvisa, p. 119-20. Find A Grave, "Judge Thomas Edwards (1806-1882)," Memorial #99947897, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=99947897&ref=acom (accessed August 30, 2017). KYR-0001-005-0021. KYR-0001-005-0130. KYR-0001-005-0095. KYR-0001-029-0552. KYR-0001-004-0156.
